content:
# I've successfully harvested 10 Iron Ore, bringing my total to 20 Iron Ore in my inventory. 
# Now that I have enough Iron Ore, I can proceed to smelt it into Iron Plates, which are required for crafting other items.

# Since I need a Stone Furnace to smelt the Iron Ore, I will need to gather Stone first. 
# I will search for a nearby Stone resource patch again.

stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Attempt to locate a nearby stone patch.
if stone_position:
    move_to(stone_position)  # Move to the nearest stone position to collect.
else:
    print("No stone resources available nearby, unable to craft a furnace!")  # If no stone is found.
